channel.title: EASYRSC server wont start
channel.description: Basically when I run the server I get a xstream/treeunmarshaller spam, I cant really see the error properly because it closes instantly even if I add a pause command. I tried adding a new xstream through eclipse and it didn't change anything.

item.title: EASYRSC server wont start
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

I think JDK7 needs xpp3 updated too but its been a long time since I made the conversion. Here is a copy of my current lib folder with everything that works with the modern JDK. Make sure you import them in your library in Eclipse/NetBeans.

http://uppit.com/9tmwqe3p0g3c/lib.zip

Read full topic
